Greetings to all,

I have just added a katana by Omi no kami Hisamichi, a wakizashi by Harima 
no Daijo Fujiwara Kiyomitsu and 15 tsuba to the web site.  Also,  the 
Kamakura jidai Aoe katana has been offered on sale for a very limited time. 
Please take a look if you have any interest.

http://www.nihontocraft.com/japanese_sword_home.html

Best regards,
Danny Massey
